query:
INSERT INTO projects (slug, title, subtitle, category, image, description, challenge, solution, results, technologies, downloadUrl, published) VALUES (
  'ai-agent-platform',
  'AI Agent Platform Architecture',
  'Autonomous AI Solutions Design',
  'AI Solutions',
  '/images/project-serverless.png',
  'Lead Solutions Architect for AI-powered autonomous agent platform at Manus AI, translating complex business requirements into scalable, secure system designs across discovery, configuration, deployment, and post-go-live transition.',
  'Design and implement scalable architecture for an AI agent platform requiring complex integrations, data models, and compliance constraints while ensuring long-term extensibility and sustainable, supportable solutions for diverse client stakeholders.',
  'Acted as primary architectural advisor to client stakeholders, guiding trade-off decisions across functionality, integrations, data models, compliance constraints, and long-term extensibility. Designed future-state architectures and workflows within Statement of Work boundaries, proactively identifying technical and operational risks related to integrations, data integrity, and adoption, mitigating them prior to production rollout.',
  JSON_ARRAY('Successfully bridged business, engineering, and support teams through comprehensive documentation', 'Preserved architectural intent through implementation to operational handoff', 'Enabled smooth transitions by documenting system workflows and configuration rationale', 'Proactively identified and mitigated risks prior to production rollout'),
  JSON_ARRAY('AWS', 'AI/ML', 'Serverless', 'API Gateway', 'Lambda', 'System Design', 'Solution Architecture'),
  '/documents/ai-platform-architecture.pdf',
  true
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 26oPSLF1JrHBkC1.root --database GS77b3TFJGdjuXRCHKnBPH --execute INSERT INTO projects (slug, title, subtitle, category, image, description, challenge, solution, results, technologies, downloadUrl, published) VALUES (
  'ai-agent-platform',
  'AI Agent Platform Architecture',
  'Autonomous AI Solutions Design',
  'AI Solutions',
  '/images/project-serverless.png',
  'Lead Solutions Architect for AI-powered autonomous agent platform at Manus AI, translating complex business requirements into scalable, secure system designs across discovery, configuration, deployment, and post-go-live transition.',
  'Design and implement scalable architecture for an AI agent platform requiring complex integrations, data models, and compliance constraints while ensuring long-term extensibility and sustainable, supportable solutions for diverse client stakeholders.',
  'Acted as primary architectural advisor to client stakeholders, guiding trade-off decisions across functionality, integrations, data models, compliance constraints, and long-term extensibility. Designed future-state architectures and workflows within Statement of Work boundaries, proactively identifying technical and operational risks related to integrations, data integrity, and adoption, mitigating them prior to production rollout.',
  JSON_ARRAY('Successfully bridged business, engineering, and support teams through comprehensive documentation', 'Preserved architectural intent through implementation to operational handoff', 'Enabled smooth transitions by documenting system workflows and configuration rationale', 'Proactively identified and mitigated risks prior to production rollout'),
  JSON_ARRAY('AWS', 'AI/ML', 'Serverless', 'API Gateway', 'Lambda', 'System Design', 'Solution Architecture'),
  '/documents/ai-platform-architecture.pdf',
  true
);
